attributes.action: have legislation effective against abusers of older people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no legislation ( as there is with childcare)to properly protect vulnerable people in our society.
Usually what happens is that the abused person is removed from their home,  to be safe from the abuser, and therefore once again a victim of our society

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
